usage: gym equipment for cable machine exercises including pull downs, press downs, rows, triceps, biceps, and lat workouts

UPPER BODY GAINS - build stronger biceps, triceps, grip, lats, shoulders, and core

ai_description: A black metal lat pulldown bar with a unique angled design and flat, paddle-style grips on each end. The bar features a central silver shackle and bolt attachment point for universal cable machine compatibility. Close-up views show the textured black material and sturdy steel construction with a matte finish. One image demonstrates practical use with a woman performing cable exercises using the attachment. The product appears new with some packaging text visible promoting its universal attachment capability and exercise versatility.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts, home gym owners, weightlifters
product_name: KAKSS Cable Machine Attachments Lat Bar Wide
